name: Patty vs Zombies
description:
Patty vs Zombies

The Official Supreme Patty Game

Shoot zombies, conquer the world, and unlock weapons, skins and more. Battle your way through bosses with special drops to enhance gameplay. Compete against your friends and see who can get to the highest round!



For more any questions, comments, concerns go to:
www.yungclouty.com
